question: when was the first deep learning paper published ?
query: SELECT DISTINCT t3.year FROM paperkeyphrase AS t2 JOIN keyphrase AS t1 ON t2.keyphraseid = t1.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t3.paperid = t2.paperid WHERE t1.keyphrasename = 'deep learning' GROUP BY t3.year ORDER BY t3.year ASC NULLS FIRST
